item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Kumo Hibachi Steakhouse

Specials include:

- $1 off all beers
- $2 off all glasses of wine
- $2 off all cocktails
- 1/2 price sushi

Parking can be found in the municipal lot diagonally across Elm Street from Kumo or behind the building, and is free after 5:30 pm.

We will be in the lounge/bar area to the right as you walk in the front door.

Your contact for the event is Ben: 203-554-5144

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.name: Monday Happy Hour - Kumo New Haven
